name: Please, Move To The Circle
description:
"Do you like to do what people tell you to do while getting praised and getting candies? Then this is the game for you!"

Endure your daily routine and... I don't know, maybe find a way to get out or something. Or, even better (since you can't escape on your own), let someone free you!
The game relies on its atmosphere. Some bit of patience is required to fully enjoy the game. :p
(In other words, the pace is too slow, the game is short and there isn't that much to do)

WASD - Move your character (sorry, I was too short on time to add zqsd support, but it was planned)
  MOUSE - Move your cursor
  LEFT CLICK - Get poor commentary on furniture and do a bit of action
  E - Skip text or Accelerate countdown
  R - Restart the game
  ALT + ENTER - Toggle fullscreen

♫♪♫♪
Don't be afraid to leave feedback of any kind! I don't bite!

This is an updated version of my GM48 entry. It features these changes:
  Adjusting the pace of the game / preventing the failed tasks to repeat
 Blocking the top path that was closing the game
 Reworked the voices and overall sounds
 Ways to restart on the second part (losing/cheat code)
 Removed a useless and "frustrating" section
 Commentary mode 
  Main menu with some options
  Miscellaneous improvements (some texts, sound effects and visual effects)

Features planned for the next (and last) update:
 Endings (game over/finishing the game - they will depend on your behaviour and will mostly be different texts)

Art, code, design, music and sound effects all done by me,
Kwisarts
